page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: Thank you to Alison Hepburn and Margaret Robbie for typing the pages. Thank you to Rev. David Simpson, Helen Anderson and the laird, Captain Kenneth Lumsden for their special help. To all those in the survey area who answered our questionaire, thank you for their interest and their time. Thank you to the P.5,6,7 pupils of Banchory-Devenick School for their hard work, enthusiasm and for writing the pages. Special thanks to Allan Dunbar, former pupil, and to Alison Hepburn without whose help and guidance our contribution would not have been possible.
